snippet: Affiliates of a Blackstone real estate fund are to pay $23.75 a share for BioMed Realty, a 10 percent premium to its closing price on Wednesday.
abstract: DealBook Online; Blackstone Group agrees to buy BioMed Realty Trust, provider of office space to life science industry, for $8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Affiliates of a Blackstone real estate fund are to pay $23.75 a share for BioMed Realty, a 10 percent premium to its closing price on Wednesday.

headline.main: Blackstone to Acquire BioMed Realty Trust for $8 Billion
